conversation.author: dagar
conversation.body:
This also includes a minor fw_pos_control_l1 cleanup where the const arg pos_sp_triplet and _pos_sp_triplet were being used interchangeably.

Possible fix for #3902

issue_comments.author: LorenzMeier
issue_comments.body: Looking good to me. It still will require putting takeoff waypoints at a suitable minimum distance - which probably needs to be fixed in the GCS.

issue_comments.author: LorenzMeier
issue_comments.body: The change looked anyway good, so I cherry-picked it it onto master. Closing.
